mapper.select: SELECT p.FG_POST_ID AS postId, p.FG_POST_TITLE AS postTitle, nu.FG_NORMAL_NICKNAME AS normalNickname, s.FG_SHARING_STATUS AS sharingStatus, pf.FG_POST_FILE_ROOT AS postFileRoot, pf.FG_POST_FILE_UUID AS postFileUuid, pf.FG_POST_FILE_NAME AS postFileName FROM FG_SHARING s, FG_POST p, FG_NORMAL_USER nu, FG_POST_FILE pf WHERE p.FG_POST_ID = s.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_POST_ID = pf.FG_POST_ID AND p.FG_USER_CODE = nu.FG_USER_CODE AND s.FG_SHARING_STATUS = '나눔가능' ORDER BY FG_POST_CREATED_AT DESC
